How to disable google talk chat status in Google Buzz

By default, it appears that any google talk status updates are considered "public".   I didn't really intend to share these with the entire world, just my chat list.  

Here's how to turn it off: http://www.google.com/support/forum/p/gmail/thread?tid=293fced14c17d43c&hl=en
